<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jug of Fond Remembrance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2193)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This large jug always seems to contain just enough of the holder's favorite alcohol to share with a friend. As long as you're holding the jug, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks. If you share a sip of the liquor from the jug with a creature, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next Diplomacy check to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) or [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) something from that creature any time within the next month.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You take a long swig on the jug and then [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about a creature you can see, with a +2 circumstance bonus to the check. If you fail but don't critically fail this check, you get a success instead. You're then [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 3 rounds.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
